title: PITR: dispatch task is gone: runtime dropped the dispatch task
body: ## Bug Report ### What version of TiKV are you using? nightly ### What operating system and CPU are you using? ### Steps to reproduce restore 24h log data to a large cluster from s3 storage(minio) with cache id enabled. https://github.com/pingcap/tidb/pull/41305 ### What did you expect? no error `dispatch task is gone: runtime dropped the dispatch task` in br.log even restore success. ### What did happened?
